item.title: [PI]Recolouring Whips
item.dc:creator: @99_stats_ftw 99 stats ftw
item.description:
@99_stats_ftw wrote:

itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.name = "Green Whip"; itemDef.description = "A Green Abyssal Whip".getBytes(); itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 528; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 12411;

Try this one. I switched your colors around!

itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 528; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 12411;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Recolouring Whips
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

How do I recolour Whips? I copied them from Dimescape but the server is just thinking it’s a normal Whip. How do I change the colours to what I want?

Here’s the Code I have

itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.name = "Green Whip"; itemDef.description = "A Green Abyssal Whip".getBytes(); itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 12411; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528;

What’s up with it?

Read full topic
